main event: Military personnel observed a round object displaying bright flashing colors at Pepperell AFB.
interesting points: The object was mostly red, but orange and blue colors were also observed., The object illuminated the sky for many miles before fading., There was no radar contact with the object at any time., The altitude of the object was estimated at 300 feet., The object was moving NNE and bobbed noticeably during the observation.
sighted object: one round object exhibiting bright flashing colors
witness description: military personnel including S/SGT Ronald Duffy and A/2C Paul Hollican
